their babies are called "squeakers," which can be metaphorically related in tone to the term "fawn."', 'Lamb - Young sheep, often white or light-colored at birth, but since lamb is not a deer species, its use here is more for comparison.', 'Tail (as an adjective) - In some contexts, young animals with long tails resembling fawn characteristics can be described as "tail-like" or possessing a "fawn-like tail."', 'Nubbin - A slang term sometimes used to describe the head of a newborn animal, particularly those with round heads and large eyes;
